signup.signupDesk: You can use the entire VIRNECT product using just one account.

errors.title: Verification code match error
errors.contents: Entered verification code does not match please try again
errors.failContent: Failed to send a verification code to your email please try again later.

password.notice: Your password must be in English and needs to be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password also needs to be made up of 4 or more of following character types. - Uppercase letter - Lowercase letter- Number - Special character ( .  ! @ # $ % ). The password must not contain consecutive numbers or 4 identical letters.

route.title: How did you hear about us?
route.placeholder: Tell us where you heard about us

serviceInfo.title: Industry classification
serviceInfo.placeholder: Tell us what type of industry classification you are from.

verification.title: Successfully sent verification email
verification.contents: A verification code is sent to your email address. Please check your email and type in the code.

ageLimit.title: Age restriction
ageLimit.contents: Users under the age of 14 cannot sign up and use the service.

password.title: Wrong password
password.contents: Your password must be in English and needs to be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password also needs to be made up of 3 or more of following character types. - Uppercase letter - Lowercase letter- Number - Special character ( .  ! @ # $ % ). The password must not contain consecutive numbers or 4 identical letters.

duplicateEmail.title: Failed to send verification email
duplicateEmail.contents: We found an existing account with that email address

verification.title: Failed to send verification email
verification.contents: Failed to send email verification please try later
